sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Hydrogen Economy Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Hydrogen Economy Act.

sections.heading: Duties. The Task Force shall have the following duties:
sections.text: Duties. The Task Force shall have the following duties:

sections.heading: Report. The Task Force shall report to the Governor and the General Assembly by December 1 of each year on its activities, findings, and recommendations
sections.text: Report. The Task Force shall report to the Governor and the General Assembly by December 1 of each year on its activities, findings, and recommendations.

sections.heading: Repealer. This Act is repealed on June 1, 2026.
sections.text: Repealer. This Act is repealed on June 1, 2026.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
